name: Solitaire for the Tilt Five (requires Tilt Five headset)
name_original: Solitaire for the Tilt Five (requires Tilt Five headset)
description:
So here's a zero game logic version of Solitaire for the Tilt Five.

I'm not a Dev, so there are many ways to break the game but that's half the fun.

Controls

Tilt Five Button - Opens Menu 

Trigger - Select and drag cards

1 Button - Flips the Card your Holding

This game should be regarded as Early Access with little possibility of parol.

The game is Free but you can donate if you like.

This is my first ever game release so please be kind..... or horrid. I'm unlikely to take it personally... maybe..... :P
